contribution.comment: I think I communicated well with the group and did my part in the time discussed by the group
Did a good job at getting things done when necessary and good at communicating with the group. Contributed to their share of the project and the quality was good!

Did a good job at getting things done when necessary and good at communicating with the group. Contributed to their share of the project and the quality was good! Did a great job of integrating the modules and was helpful in debugging code and compiling the program.

Did a good job at getting things done when necessary and good at communicating with the group. Contributed to their share of the project and the quality was good! Did a great job of implementing the PWM devices and was really good at debugging.
